service.name: CourseOfTheExpectedDegree
service.description: This service verify if the execution course belongs to one definitive degree

service.name: ReadExecutionCoursesByExecutionDegree
service.description: Reads execution courses from an execution degree

service.name: ReadExecutionDegreesByExecutionYearAndDegreeType
service.description: Reads all execution degrees by execution year and degree type. If degree type is null then it reads all. If execution year is null then it reads by current execution year.

service.name: CourseOfTheExpectedDegree
service.description: This service verify if the execution course belongs to one definitive degree

service.name: AddCoordinatorByManager
service.description: This service add a coordinator to a execution degree in manager operations

service.name: RemoveCoordinatorsByManager
service.description: This service remove one or more coordinators to a execution degree in manager operations

service.name: ResponsibleCoordinatorsByManager
service.description: This service associate a coordinator to a execution degree with responsible functions in manager operations

service.name: TeacherResponsibleByExecutionCourse
service.description: This service verify if teacher is responsible of the execution course to edit

service.name: SearchPerson
service.description: Service that find a person by number, name and/or email

service.name: ReadAllDepartments
service.description: Service that retrieves all departments from the database

service.name: ReadProfessorshipsAndResponsibilitiesByDepartment
service.description: Service that retrieves all professorships by department from the database
